body.p: Variables releated to the configuration of Kubernetes Persistent Volumes are shown in .

ul.li: playbooks/k8s-nfs-provisioner.yml is used to enable a dynamic NFS provisioner which can be used to automatically create and allocate Kubernetes persistent volumes. The backend storage is provided by an NFS backend. This playbook is run from the Ansible box after downloading a UCP client bundle for the admin account and sourcing the downloaded env.sh file.
